plot: Light in August, a novel that contrasts stark tragedy with hopeful perseverance in the face of mortality, which features some of Faulknerâ€™s most memorable characters: guileless, dauntless Lena Grove, in search of the father of her unborn child; Reverend Gail Hightower, a lonely outcast haunted by visions of Confederate glory; and Joe Christmas, a desperate, enigmatic drifter consumed by his mixed ancestry.
characters: Lena Grove, Lucas Burch, Byron Bunch, Joe Christmas, Joanna Burden, Reverend Gail Hightower, Eupheus "Doc" Hines
